Hi! I'm Alex Yeung

About me

Hello there, welcome to my corner of the internet! I'm Alex, a software engineer during the day and running / bouldering / badminton enthusiast all the time!
I'm currently studying Computer Science @ UBC in Vancouver. I'm interested in leveraging technology to bridge the world's inequalities, particularly in the areas of biotech and healthcare. Outside of work, I am an avid reader, runner, and am always down to go hiking or rock climbing (even though I'm a complete rookie)!
Feel free to download my resume, poke around my GitHub, contact me for a chat at alex.ly.yeung@gmail.com, or connect on LinkedIn. Always looking to make new friends and meet new people!
